member.name: T:Windows.System.ProcessLauncher
member.summary: Starts the specified process with associated arguments, if any.

member.name: M:Windows.System.ProcessLauncher.RunToCompletionAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Launches a new process.
member.returns: When this method completes, it returns the results of the process.
member.param: The name of the process to launch.

member.name: M:Windows.System.ProcessLauncher.RunToCompletionAsync(System.String,System.String,Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions)
member.summary: Launches a new process, including the specified options.
member.returns: When this method completes, it returns the results of the process.
member.param: File name of process to start.
Associated options for running the process.

member.name: T:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions
member.summary: Specifies the options used to launch the specified process.

member.name: M:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates and initializes a new instance of the process launcher options object.

member.name: P:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions.StandardError
member.summary: Specifies where a standard error is directed to.
member.returns: The stream to direct standard errors to.

member.name: P:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions.StandardInput
member.summary: Specifies where a standard input is coming from.
member.returns: The input stream for standard input.

member.name: P:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions.StandardOutput
member.summary: Specifies where a standard output is directed to.
member.returns: The stream to which standard output is directed.

member.name: P:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherOptions.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory the process launcher will work in.

member.name: T:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherResult
member.summary: Represents the return of the launched process.

member.name: P:Windows.System.ProcessLauncherResult.ExitCode
member.summary: Represents the exit code of the process that was run from ProcessLauncher.

member.name: T:Windows.System.ShutdownKind
member.summary: Describes the types of shutdown that you can perform for a device that runs in fixed-purpose mode.

member.name: F:Windows.System.ShutdownKind.Restart
member.summary: Shuts down the fixed-purpose device, then restarts the device.

member.name: F:Windows.System.ShutdownKind.Shutdown
member.summary: Shuts down the fixed-purpose device without restarting the device.

member.name: T:Windows.System.ShutdownManager
member.summary: Manages the shutdown of devices that run in fixed-purpose mode.

member.name: M:Windows.System.ShutdownManager.BeginShutdown(Windows.System.ShutdownKind,Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Shuts down a device that runs in fixed-purpose mode, and optionally restarts the device after the specified number of seconds.
member.param: The type of shutdown to perform, either with or without restarting the device.
The amount of time in seconds to wait before restarting the device if shutdownKind is ShutdownKind.Restart.

member.name: M:Windows.System.ShutdownManager.CancelShutdown
member.summary: Cancels a shutdown of a fixed-purpose device that is already in progress.

member.name: T:Windows.System.SystemManagementContract
member.summary: Represents the Windows.System.SystemManagementContract API contract.

member.name: T:Windows.System.TimeZoneSettings
member.summary: Contains methods and properties for interacting with time zones.

member.name: P:Windows.System.TimeZoneSettings.CanChangeTimeZone
member.summary: Gets whether the time zone can be changed.
member.returns: True if the time zone can be changed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Windows.System.TimeZoneSettings.CurrentTimeZoneDisplayName
member.summary: Gets the display name of the current time zone.
member.returns: The display name of the current time zone.

member.name: P:Windows.System.TimeZoneSettings.SupportedTimeZoneDisplayNames
member.summary: Gets the display names for all supported time zones.
member.returns: The display names for all supported time zones.

member.name: M:Windows.System.TimeZoneSettings.ChangeTimeZoneByDisplayName(System.String)
member.summary: Changes the time zone using the display name.
member.param: The display name of the time zone to change to.
